name: Eternal Shade
description:
Made using Unity for Abyssal's Pixel Game Jam #5
By Raven and Sap

CONTROLS
WASD/Arrow Keys - Movement
E - Pick up ember from campfire
E - Shoot ember at nearby darkness creature

ETERNAL SHADE
After the world has been devoured by eternal darkness.
All that remains of light is one, small, but mystical bonfire.
Your goal is to protect the mystic flame at all costs, don't let the creatures of darkness put out Earth's final flame.
